src:
Hasil Pertandingan PSM Makassar vs Kalteng Putra: 2-1
06 Nov 2019, 17:37 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSM Makassar berhasil mengamankan kemenangan di pertandingan pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 2019. Menjamu Kalteng Putra, tuan rumah berhasil menang dengan skor 2-1.
Gol kemenangan PSM dicetak oleh Amido Balde dan Rizky Pellu sementara Kalteng Putra sempat memberi perlawanan berkat gol Pandi Lestaluhu.
PSM tampil menekan di awal laga melawan Kallteng Putra. Bermain di kandang, PSM tak mau kecolongan seperti lawan Persija lalu.
Meski begitu, justru Kalteng Putra yang unggul terlebih dahulu. Manfaatkan umpan Hasbulla, Pandi Lestaluhu mengubah skor menjadi 1-0 di menit ke-17.
Usai kebobolan, PSM terus melancar serangan tapi gagal untuk menyamakan skor. Hingga menit ke-39, PSM masih menemui kebuntuan.
Pada menit ke-43, Wiljan Pluim mencoba manfaatkan umpan Rizky tapi tak mampu menjangkaunya. Umpan-umpan silang pemain PSM masih belum efektif.
Usaha keras PSM Makassar akhirnya berbuah manis di menit ke-45. Amildo Balde sukses membuat skor 1-1 usai manfaatkan umpan Hasim Kipuw
Hingga babak pertama berakhir, PSM berhasil membuat skor 1-1 lawan Kalteng Putra.

Baca Jalannya pertandingan di babak kedua di bawah ini.
text:
Makassar vs Kalteng Putra PSM Match Results: 2-1
Nov 6 2019, 17:37 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSM Makassar managed to secure victory in the 27th Week of Shopee League 1 2019 match. Entertaining Kalteng Putra, the host managed to win with a score of 2-1.
PSM's winning goal was scored by Amido Balde and Rizky Pellu while Central Kalimantan Putra gave resistance thanks to Pandi Lestaluhu's goal.
PSM appeared pressing at the beginning of the match against Kallteng Putra. Playing at home, PSM did not want to be cheated like Persija's opponents.
Even so, precisely Kalteng Putra is superior first. Take advantage of Hasbulla's bait, Pandi Lestaluhu changed the score to 1-0 in the 17th minute.
After conceding, PSM continued to launch attacks but failed to equalize the score. Until the 39th minute, PSM was still deadlocked.
In the 43rd minute, Wiljan Pluim tried to use Rizky's bait but was unable to reach it. PSM players' crosses are still ineffective.
Makassar PSM hard efforts finally paid off in the 45th minute. Amildo Balde successfully made the score 1-1 after utilizing Hasim Kipuw's pass
Until the first half ended, PSM managed to make a score 1-1 against Kalteng Putra.

Read the game in the second half below.
